thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan / World Trade Center Area - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value, excellent location
thread.title_full: Good value, excellent location - Review of Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan / World Trade Center Area, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: andegod
title: Good value, excellent location
text:
Stayed for a long weekend with my partner, staff is very courteous, the hotel is clean and comfortable. The weather was very cold and that affected the room temperature as well as the large windows are not isolated that well.
Nice small restaurant as well, good quality food but you will find matching breakfast places close by with less price.
Would definitely recommend.
